short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds 10% off to every Meta store game using Minibattlelop's creator code.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IMPORTANT
Some ad blockers / link protection agents can prevent the affiliate link from being loaded, this includes desktop based protection.
This is an issue with the affiliate system as a whole.

Automatically applies affiliate codes from MinibattleLop's github list which can be found herehttps://github.com/Minibattle/Meta-Quest-Affiliate-Codes
This code adds 10% off to every meta store product including apps, and games.

HOW TO USE:
1. Download Extension
2. Go to the meta store
3. Click on any game / app 
4. Click accept on the prompt that will appear shortly after
